84 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
85 // Class template stResultPair
86 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
99 template < class ObjectType >
100 class stResultPair{
101  public:
105  typedef ObjectType tObject;
106 
116  stResultPair(tObject * obj, stDistance distance){
117 
118  this->Object = obj;
119  this->JoinedObject = NULL;
120  this->Distance = distance;
121  }//end stResultPair
122 
133  stResultPair(tObject * obj, tObject * joinedobj, stDistance distance){
134 
135  this->Object = obj;
136  this->JoinedObject = joinedobj;
137  this->Distance = distance;
138  }//end stResultPair
139 
144  ~stResultPair(){
145 
146  if (Object != NULL){
147  delete Object;
148  }//end if
149  if (JoinedObject != NULL){
150  delete JoinedObject;
151  }
152  }//end ~stResultPair
153 
157  const tObject * GetObject(){
158  return Object;
159  }//end GetObject
160 
164  const tObject * GetJoinedObject(){
165  return JoinedObject;
166  }//end GetObject
167 
171  stDistance GetDistance(){
172  return Distance;
173  }//end GetDistance
174  private:
178  tObject * Object;
179 
183  tObject * JoinedObject;
184 
188  stDistance Distance;
189 };//end stResultPair
190 
191 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
192 // Class template stResult
193 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
218 template < class ObjectType >
219 class stResult{
220  public:
224  enum tQueryType{
228  UNKNOWN = 0,
229 
233  RANGEQUERY = 1,
234 
238  KNEARESTQUERY = 2,
239 
243  ESTIMATEKNEARESTQUERY = 3,
244 
248  RINGQUERY = 4,
249 
253  KRINGQUERY = 5,
254 
258  KANDRANGEQUERY = 6,
259 
263  KORRANGEQUERY = 7,
264 
268  POINTQUERY = 8,
269 
273  REVERSEDRANGEQUERY = 9,
274 
278  KFARTHESTQUERY = 10
279  };//end tQueryType
280 
284  typedef ObjectType tObject;
285 
289  typedef stResultPair< ObjectType > tPair;
290 
298  stResult(unsigned int hint = 1){
299  // Reserve results
300  Pairs.reserve(hint);
301  // No info
302  SetQueryInfo();
303  }//end stResult
304 
308  virtual ~stResult();
309 
313  tPair & operator [] (unsigned int idx){
314  return (*Pairs[idx]);
315  }//end operator []
316 
320  unsigned int GetNumOfEntries(){
321  return Pairs.size();
322  }//end GetNumOfEntries
323 
331  void AddPair(tObject * obj, stDistance distance){
332  unsigned int pos;
333 
334  pos = this->Find(distance);
335  Pairs.insert(Pairs.begin() + pos, new tPair(obj, distance));
336  }//end AddPair
337 
347  void AddJoinedPair(tObject * obj, tObject * joinedObj, stDistance distance){
348  unsigned int pos;
349 
350  pos = this->Find(distance);
351  Pairs.insert(Pairs.begin() + pos, new tPair(obj, joinedObj, distance));
352  }//end AddJoinedPair
353 
357  void RemoveLast(){
358 
359  if (Pairs.size() > 0){
360  if (Pairs[Pairs.size() - 1] != NULL){
361  delete Pairs[Pairs.size() - 1];
362  }//end if
363  Pairs.pop_back();
364  }//end if
365  }//end RemoveLast
366 
370  void RemoveFirst(){
371 
372  if (Pairs.size() > 0){
373  if (Pairs[0] != NULL){
374  delete Pairs[0];
375  }//end if
376  Pairs.erase(Pairs.begin());
377  }//end if
378  }//end RemoveFirst
379 
384  stDistance GetMinimumDistance(){
385 
386  if (Pairs.size() > 0){
387  return Pairs[0]->GetDistance();
388  }else{
389  return -1;
390  }//end if
391  }//end GetMinimumDistance
392 
397  stDistance GetMaximumDistance(){
398 
399  if (Pairs.size() > 0){
400  return Pairs[Pairs.size() - 1]->GetDistance();
401  }else{
402  return -1;
403  }//end if
404  }//end GetMaximumDistance
405 
415  void Cut(unsigned int limit);
416 
426  void CutFirst(unsigned int limit);
427 
449  void SetQueryInfo(tObject * sample = NULL, int querytype = UNKNOWN,
450  stCount k = 0, stDistance radius = 0.0,
451  stDistance innerRadius = 0.0, bool tie = false){
452  QueryType = querytype;
453  K = k;
454  Radius = radius;
455  InnerRadius = innerRadius;
456  Sample = sample;
457  Tie = tie;
458  }//end SetQueryInfo
459 
479  void SetQueryInfo(tObject * sample, int querytype,
480  stCount k, stDistance radius, bool tie){
481  this->SetQueryInfo(sample, querytype, k, radius, 0.0, tie);
482  }//end SetQueryInfo
483 
488  int GetQueryType(){
489  return QueryType;
490  }//end GetQueryType
491 
496  unsigned int GetK(){
497  return K;
498  }//end GetK
499 
504  stDistance GetRadius(){
505  return Radius;
506  }//end GetRadius
507 
511  stDistance GetInnerRadius(){
512  return InnerRadius;
513  }//end GetRadius
514 
521  tObject * GetSample(){
522  return Sample;
523  }//end GetSample
524 
531  bool GetTie(){
532  return Tie;
533  }//end GetTie
534 
541  bool IsEqual(const stResult * r1);
542 
549  double Precision(const stResult * r1);
550 
551 
557  void Intersection(stResult * result1, stResult * result2);
558 
564  void Union(stResult * result1, stResult * result2);
565 
566  private:
570  vector < tPair * > Pairs;
571 
575  int QueryType;
576 
581  unsigned int K;
582 
587  bool Tie;
588 
593  stDistance Radius;
594 
598  stDistance InnerRadius;
599 
603  tObject * Sample;
604 
612  unsigned int Find(stDistance distance);
613 
614 };//end stResult
